sentences.sContent: It seems the banks always profit from farmers’ misfortunes.
sentences.sCn: 银行似乎总是从农民的不幸中获益。

sentences.sContent: ...Brazil’s stretch of misfortune has created opportunities for China...

remMethod.val: mis(坏) ＋ fortune(运气) → 不幸， 逆境

trans.tranCn: 不幸， 厄运， 逆境； 不幸事故， 灾难， 灾祸
trans.tranOther: very bad luck, or something that happens to you as a result of bad luck
